revision.text:
Farm items are various items you can use on your farm to help you with growing and mutating new [[berries]]. These can be bought from [[Berry Master]]s of any [[region]] using [[Farming Points|Farm points]] {{farmpoints}}.
The following items can be categorized as Farm Items : {| class="wikitable" |+ Farm Items |- ! Name !! Price !! Descriptoin |- | Boost Mulch || <center> 50 {{farmpoints}} || Increases berry growth rate when applied to a plot that have berry |- | Rich Mulch || 100 {{farmpoints}} || Increases berry the amount of berries you would gain from harvesting the plot it is applied to |- | Surprise Mulch || 150 {{farmpoints}}|| Increases the chance of a berry mutation when applied to an empty plot |- | Amaze Mulch || 200 {{farmpoints}} || Increases all berry effects |- | Shovel || 300 {{farmpoints}} || Clears a plot instantly to let you plant a new berry in that plot |}
revision.comment: Created page with "Farm items are various items you can use on your farm to help you with growing and mutating new [[berries]]. These can be bought from [[Berry Master]]s of any [[region]] using..."
